show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #11, Chad Tuttle "Down the Regenerative Rabbit Hole"
subtitle: #11, Chad Tuttle "Down the Regenerative Rabbit Hole"
summary:
My Friend Chad Tuttle from C2T Ranch north of Hays Kansas joins us to talk about how he fell down the regenerative rabbit hole.
Last year Chad and his wife were the #1 Hipcamp site in the US and the #2 RV site on Hipcamp as well.

Email Chad: Catuttle1@gmail.com
Visit the website www.c2tranch.com

Links to Chad's Hipcamp sites:
https://www.hipcamp.com/en-US/kansas/c2t-ranch-on-the-saline-river/c2t-ranch-on-the-saline-primitive

https://www.hipcamp.com/en-US/kansas/c2t-ranch-on-the-saline-river/c2t-ranch-on-the-saline-rv
